title: 关于加了mod局域网联机不了的问题
author: redwingslin
txt_content:
Forge Mod Loader has found ID mismatches Complete details are in the log file.
ID 100 ismismatched between world and game
ID 115 ismismatched between world and game
ID 99 ismismatched between world and game
ID 20 ismismatched between world and game
ID 59 ismismatched between world and game
ID 104 ismismatched between world and game
ID 105 ismismatched between world and game
一般情况下单人模式打开地图就这样显示，按了确定没问题可以继续玩。

 但是和朋友在家局域网就连不上了，求帮助......CKVT

replies.txt_content: 我也是但是吧 TMI 删了就ok   TMI（内置修改器）
